item.title: Using Tree Sitter Parsers in Rust
item.description: Tree Sitter is a parser generator tool and parsing library. It generates portable parsers and provides bindings for several languages including Rust. Tree Sitter grammars are available for several languages. This is a game changer because it lowers the barrier to entry for writing language tooling. You no longer need to write your own parser to implement language tooling. With Tree Sitter, you can now simply use an existing parser.
